姓.definition: family name; surname; to be surnamed ...

姓名.definition: surname and given name; full name

姓蔣還是姓汪.pinyin: xìng jiǎng hái shì xìng wāng
姓蔣還是姓汪.definition: friend or foe? (quote from 沙家浜[Sha1 jia1 bang1]) (蔣|蒋[Jiang3] here refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石[Jiang3 Jie4 shi2] and 汪[Wang1] refers to Wang Jingwei 汪精衛|汪精卫[Wang1 Jing1 wei4])
